experience.details: Developed a real-time e-commerce platform using the MERN stack, RESTful API, and SQL, enhancing user retention by 20% and serving 1,000+ visitors. Optimized performance with analytics tools and containerized deployments, reducing page load time by 15% and manual processing by 30%.

Developed fintech features using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, enhancing system reliability by 25% and handling 10,000+ daily transactions with zero inconsistencies. Built a responsive front-end with React.js, improving user engagement by 15% and reducing API response times by 20%.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: Created a personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: E-Commerce Web App
projects.description: Built a full-stack e-commerce application using the MERN stack with integrated payment systems.
